Text: I can't get the subtitles to work, the audio is fine but the subtitles get way way off sync and I don't know how to fix it.

I finally got the video to play correctly using the free VLC Player. http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ 

But now that I've finally seen the damn thing I want to buy it but I can't find it online anywhere.  Where can I order this DVD?
yeah, I don't think the DVD is for sale on international shops, only here in Lithuania... :)
